meanings.definition: A person or thing that energizes or gives energy.
meanings.sent1: The enthusiastic coach was an energizer for the team, always motivating them to do their best.
meanings.sent2: The morning sunlight acted as an energizer, waking up the sleepy flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The energetic puppy was like a little energizer bunny, bouncing around the house all day.
meanings.sent4: Her positive attitude was an energizer, sparking joy and enthusiasm in everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: Music can be a powerful energizer, lifting our spirits and energizing our bodies.

meanings.definition: A brand of batteries or battery-operated products.
meanings.sent1: I need to buy an energizer for my flashlight before our camping trip.
meanings.sent2: The remote control requires an energizer to work properly.
meanings.sent3: The toy robot powered by an energizer battery danced around the room.
meanings.sent4: Make sure to always have an energizer handy for your electronic devices.
meanings.sent5: The clock stopped ticking until a new energizer was inserted into it.
